uk.ac.bradford.pisoc.redribbon.data.model

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.bradford.pisoc.redribbon.data.model.Item

  • public class Item
extends Object
    This class represents one item from an RSS 2.0 feed. 
         
         <item>
             <title>Title</title>
             <description>Body text</description>
             <pubDate>Event date</pubDate>
         </item>
    Item objects are used to pass item data between:
    • The RssFeedParser and SQLite database.
    • The SQLite database and UI.
    Author:
    Ben Farnfield
    See Also:
    RssFeedParser, ItemDAO
